plugin.description: Maven is a software project management and comprehension tool. Based on the concept of a project object model (POM), Maven can manage a project's build, reporting and documentation from a central piece of information.

mojo.description: This is an UpdatePluginMojo class. This mojo is for updating a plugin based on selected plugin name

parameter.name: remoteArtifactRepositories
parameter.description: List of Remote Repositories used by the resolver.

mojo.description: This is an ShowPluginListTask class. This task is for showing information of all installable plugins

parameter.name: remoteArtifactRepositories
parameter.description: List of Remote Repositories used by the resolver.

mojo.description: This is an HelpMojo class. This mojo is for showing how to use anyframe custom mojos based on Maven
This is an VersionMojo class. This mojo is for showing anyframe version information.

parameter.name: remoteArtifactRepositories
parameter.description: List of Remote Repositories used by the resolver.

mojo.description: This is an UninstallPluginMojo class. This mojo is for uninstalling a specified plugin

parameter.name: metadata
parameter.description: folder which includes .metadata/anyframe-plugins-metadata.mf file (in case of multi project).

parameter.name: remoteArtifactRepositories
parameter.description: List of Remote Repositories used by the resolver.

mojo.description: This is an InstallPluginMojo class. This mojo is for installing a new plugin based on selected plugin name

parameter.name: interactiveMode
parameter.description: User settings use to check the interactiveMode.

parameter.name: remoteArtifactRepositories
parameter.description: List of Remote Repositories used by the resolver.

mojo.description: This is an ShowInstalledPluginListMojo class. This mojo is for showing information of install plugins

parameter.name: remoteArtifactRepositories
parameter.description: List of Remote Repositories used by the resolver.

mojo.description: This is an PlacePluginDependenciesMojo class. This mojo is for copying dependent libraries of a current pom file

parameter.name: remoteArtifactRepositories
parameter.description: List of Remote Repositories used by the resolver.
